product_name: Rossignol Experience Pro Carbon Ski Poles - Men's
long_description: The men's Rossignol Experience Pro Carbon ski poles are all-mountain poles with durable, very lightweight carbon shafts and bi-injected grips that fit comfortably in your hands. The men's Rossignol Experience Pro Carbon ski poles use carbon fiber construction for featherweight performance. Race baskets are designed for packed snow, and provide reliable purchase on hardpack.
short_description: The men's Rossignol Experience Pro Carbon ski poles are all-mountain poles with durable, very lightweight carbon shafts and bi-injected grips that fit comfortably in your hands.
